description:
Perform filtering operations on fixel-based data.

If the first input to the command is a specific fixel data file, then a filtered version of only that file will be generated by the command. Alternatively, if the input is the location of a fixel directory, then the command will create a duplicate of the fixel directory, and apply the specified filter operation to all fixel data files within the directory.

References:

matrix.title: matrix
matrix.description: provide a fixel-fixel connectivity matrix for filtering operations that require it

threshold_value.title: threshold_value
threshold_value.description: specify a threshold for the input fixel data file values (default = 0.5)

threshold_connectivity.title: threshold_connectivity
threshold_connectivity.description: specify a fixel-fixel connectivity threshold for connected-component analysis (default = 0.10000000000000001)

fwhm.title: fwhm
fwhm.description: the full-width half-maximum (FWHM) of the spatial component of the smoothing filter (default = 10mm)

minweight.title: minweight
minweight.description: apply a minimum threshold to smoothing weights (default = 0.01)

mask.title: mask
mask.description: only perform smoothing within a specified binary fixel mask

quiet.title: quiet
